sub_title: Senior Aviation Consultant @ To70 The Netherlands
summary:
Currently active as Airport CDM expert and project leader. Recently active as Project Leader for Airport CDM and integration to the Network Manager at Dutch Air Traffic Control LVNL, as well as Amsterdam Airport Schiphol in the CDM@AMS program.

Prior active as senior aviation consultant for various customers in Airports and Air Traffic Management providing support for Airport CDM, Operational Concepts, Business Assessments, Procurement documentation, promotion or marketing, as well as related activities. Content expertise on Airport CDM, Airport Operations Center (APOC), efficiency and planning.

Personal goals are to:
 - Improve airport operations efficiency and predictability by applying Airport CDM knowledge;
 - Support ATM and Airport stakeholders in developing their operational development;
 - Applying social, cultural and organisation skills as consultant or manager.

Experience as 
 - Entrepreneur in Querendo and QSi Holding since 1999
 - Research & Development Manager in NLR from 2002 until 2008
 - Airport Collaborative Decision Making (CDM) expert in Eurocontrol since 2007
 - Consultancy since 2010 in Tuinstra-Consultancy

projects.title: Aircraft in the Future ATM System (AFAS)
projects.description: The Aircraft in the Future ATM System (AFAS) project investigated the possibilities to safely integrate a beneficial selection of technologies based on an advanced Flight Management System and put them into operation in a way considered attractive to all actors involved. The AFAS project was set within the Fifth Framework Programme for Competitive and Sustainable Growth of the European Commission with Airbus being the leader of a consortium incorporating the expertise of companies in the fields of avionics, ground technology and ATM research.

contributors.headline: Senior Aviation Consultant @ To70 The Netherlands
Senior R&D Engineer at Sustainability and Environment department/NLR
Sr. R&D Manager at National Aerospace Laboratory

profile_positions.description:
Development of business in area of Airport and Aviation Efficiency, project leader for various projects on implementation, training and change management, definition and validation.

2020-2022 implementation of Noi Bai and Than Son Nhat for ACV in Vietnam. 2022- present implementation at Muscat for Oman Airports.

2019 e-Learning development for Manchester and Stansted Airports for MAG.

2018-2019 project leader for the Predictability Improvement project at Schiphol Airport, working with sector parties AAS, LVNL and KLM. In parallel project leader within LVNL for the internal project team.

Separately project leader for Airport CDM Training, Feasibility, Implementation Support in Europe, Latin America and Asia.

Recently project leader for the connection of Schiphol Airport to Eurocontrol NMOC: 2016-2018. Higlight the successful connection 16 May 2018: Schiphol became CDM Airport.

Airport Efficiency senior aviation consultant, with more than fifteen years as instructor, facilitator, analyst and project leader in Airport Collaborative Decision Making implementation and support projects. 

Aviation consultant on SESAR validation activities related to Airport Operations Management, including APOC, TAM, AOP, NOP, UDPP, and related subjects. Provision of support in concept development, validation, sales and project execution.

Validation expert in Departure and Arrival Management sequencing in relation to Airport CDM and Air Traffic Management procedures.
profile_positions.title: Senior Aviation Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Freelance consultant for support to Air Traffic Management and Airport stakeholders both in The Netherlands as well as International.

Experiences
 - Training/Consultancy/Support in the field of 
       * Airport Collaborative Decision Making (CDM)
       * Air Traffic Flow Management (ATFM)
       * Departure & Arrival Management (DMAN-AMAN)
 - Project management support
 - Procurement documentation support
 - Bid Management support
 - Promotional activities
 - Related activities
profile_positions.title: Senior Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Querendo Limited is originally a Dutch company which was founded in Amsterdam (The Netherlands) in 1999 and which has moved its headquarters to Hong Kong as of 2007 to better support its operations in the Asia/Pacific region. The company’s core business is to develop media solutions which can be integrated into information systems and on the internet.

Querendo has a joint venture company together with Si ATM AB in Stockholm, named QSi Holding, incorporated also in Hong Kong. See also www.qsi-holding.com.
profile_positions.title: Founder and Director Finance & Legal

profile_positions.description:
A media technology company in Hong Kong which has emerged as the result of a joint venture between Querendo Limited and Si ATM. Currently main activities are taking place in Indonesia, Jakarta.

Querendo Limited is originally a Dutch company which was founded in Amsterdam (The Netherlands) in 1999 and which has moved its headquarters to Hong Kong as of 2007 to better support its operations in the Asia/Pacific region. The company’s core business is to develop media solutions which can be integrated into information systems and on the internet. Within the joint venture company, Querendo is mainly responsible for customer relations and advertising sales. The team consists of a mix of engineers and media staff that support various local partners around the world. 

Si ATM is a Swedish company based in Stockholm. Since its incorporation in 1981 the company has focused on activities within the air traffic management (ATM) field. With a product range of air traffic control (ATC) simulators to full-scale ATC systems, Si ATM have several reference case installations at airports around the world and have built up a strong reputation as an ATM systems developer. Within the joint venture company, Si ATM is mainly responsible for system development, installation and maintenance.
profile_positions.title: Chief Executive Officer

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for all the financial operations and reporting of the company. Working in the board of directors preparing the financial policy and strategy.

QSi Holding is a media technology company in Hong Kong which has emerged as the result of a joint venture between Querendo Limited and Si ATM.

Querendo Limited is originally a Dutch company which was founded in Amsterdam (The Netherlands) in 1999 and which has moved its headquarters to Hong Kong as of 2007 to better support its operations in the Asia/Pacific region. The company’s core business is to develop media solutions which can be integrated into information systems and on the internet. Within the joint venture company, Querendo is mainly responsible for customer relations and advertising sales. The team consists of a mix of engineers and media staff that support various local partners around the world. 

Si ATM is a Swedish company based in Stockholm. Since its incorporation in 1981 the company has focused on activities within the air traffic management (ATM) field. With a product range of air traffic control (ATC) simulators to full-scale ATC systems, Si ATM have several reference case installations at airports around the world and have built up a strong reputation as an ATM systems developer. Within the joint venture company, Si ATM is mainly responsible for system development, installation and maintenance.
profile_positions.title: Chief Financial Officer

profile_positions.description: After the NMOC Connection, Schiphol Airport continued to improve Operational Predictability of its Airport CDM operation. As project leader we aimed to further develop functionality, procedures, and key performance parameters for the purpose of Predictability Improvement.
profile_positions.title: Project Leader Predictability Improvement Schiphol

profile_positions.description: CEO in the Board of Directors of DUQSi Indonesia. DUQSi aims to produce and sale media technology targeting audiences for effective media advertisement or other exposure. More information can be found on www.duqsi-indonesia.com
profile_positions.title: CEO

profile_positions.description:
In May 2018 Schiphol connected successfully to Eurocontrol Network Manager. The NMOC Connection project team under my lead prepared the concept of operations, functional and procedural changes, technical evaluations, and operational trials. In september 2018 we presented the 100 days result with benefits visible in various performance indicators.

More than the connection to Eurocontrol NMOC, the ambition of making Schiphol a predictable airport in Europe drives the team forward to further improvements. I consider it a privilege to work with so many experts in a team of excellence in one of the largest airports of Europe.
profile_positions.title: Project Leader CDM@AMS NMOC Connection

profile_positions.description:
Airport CDM consultant for Airport CDM documentation, development, review, stakeholder consultation, airport implementation, training and support. Perform development of organisation or operational procedures and concept documentation.

Independent Consulting Limited was established in May 2007 with headquarters in Hong Kong, the metropolitan hub of the Asia/Pacific market. Through our network of professional and experienced consultants we provide technical and operational expertise, advice and support to our clients within the ATC and Aviation sectors around the globe.
profile_positions.title: Airport CDM Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Representing Si ATM in the Asian markets,working with local agents in order to prepare tender processes or increase the profile among potential customers.

Si ATM has since 1981 provided complete Air Traffic Management solutions for operational, training and research and development purposes. The company was founded by personnel from the Swedish ATM industry with extensive previous experience in the area of Air Traffic Control. 

Si ATM has throughout its existence consequently and systematically focused on activities in the ATM area. Our products ranges from operative ATC systems to scalable training systems for aerodrome, approach and area control training.

Specialties are Air Traffic Control, Simulators, Air Traffic Management, OLDI Tools.
profile_positions.title: Marketing Manager

profile_positions.description: A media company which is based in Dubai Media City and which is a subsidiary of QSi Holding Ltd. Its main product is The Terminal, a television channel that broadcasts real-time flight information in hotels combined with digital advertising. This product is currently running live in more than 30,000 hotel rooms throughout Dubai and Abu Dhabi.
profile_positions.title: Non-Executive Board Member
